content: Hey @Josh Triplett, let's talk about coordination on asking for status updates, and also a bit about how we can automate the process for next time =)
:+1:
What did you have in mind?
I think what I would like is
• project board contains tracking issues for everything
• each issue has a link to zulip stream and leads
• (this also lives on the team repo, I guess, but that's kind of a lot of overhead)
Do we want this to be push or pull? Are we asking for status updates, or are we just providing a schedule upon which we expect status updates?
• we run a command triagebot gather-feedback and it goes and opens a topic in each stream, pinging the leads and requesting a comment
then we run a command triagebot summary-report before the meeting and it generates from the template and scrapes the comments people posted

Josh Triplett said:

Do we want this to be push or pull? Are we asking for status updates, or are we just providing a schedule upon which we expect status updates?

both :)

That sounds like a good approach to me. Could we integrate the summary-report into the agenda automatically? Then we just need a reminder on the lang team calendar to run gather-feedback a week before the meeting.
the summary report is the doc for the planning meeting
as I see it
vs the triage meeting
